markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Range](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)</title>

**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 17

These attacks will either list a finite range or a range increment, which follows the normal rules for [range increments](/Rules.aspx?ID=227).
name: Range
